title: Elven cloak/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak")**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Elven_cloak/ko "Elven cloak/ko")

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   精灵斗篷   [![Elven cloak.png](/images/e/ed/Elven_cloak.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_cloak.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                         | 褪色的斗篷                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 装备槽位                                                                                       | [斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")                                                                                                                                                            |
| AC                                                                                         | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")                                                                                |
| 特殊效果                                                                                       | - [MC1](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")
- [潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)") |
|                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 基础价                                                                                        | 60 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                                                                                                         |
| 重量                                                                                         | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                   |
| 材料                                                                                         | [布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                              |

**精灵斗篷**（elven cloak）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")。它由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**褪色的斗篷**（faded pall）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [6.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [6.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [6.6 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [7 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [8 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵斗篷[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

精灵族[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一件+2精灵斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")怪物生成时有1⁄4的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件精灵斗篷[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

[弗拉德之塔](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%97%E6%8B%89%E5%BE%B7%E4%B9%8B%E5%A1%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "弗拉德之塔 (page does not exist)")的第一层必定有一个小隔间中会生成一件精灵斗篷[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 20cbadcf](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e)，[巫师任务](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师任务 (page does not exist)")的领袖[绿衣娜菲利特](/index.php?title=%E7%BB%BF%E8%A1%A3%E5%A8%9C%E8%8F%B2%E5%88%A9%E7%89%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "绿衣娜菲利特 (page does not exist)")生成时会携带一件+5精灵斗篷。

## 描述

精灵斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")1和[潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)")特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵斗篷会产生特殊的消息，并[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")斗篷。

## 策略

- *主条目：[潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)")*

精灵斗篷在玩家需要应对有大群怪物聚集的[特殊房间](/index.php?title=%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A%E6%88%BF%E9%97%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "特殊房间 (page does not exist)")（例如[仓库番](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%93%E5%BA%93%E7%95%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "仓库番 (page does not exist)")的[动物园](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E5%9B%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "动物园 (page does not exist)")）时很有用。不过，如果你有其他实用的斗篷了，用[潜行戒指](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C%E6%88%92%E6%8C%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行戒指 (page does not exist)")等来源提供潜行更好。如果没有其他实用斗篷的话，精灵斗篷可以一直用到游戏中后期。

精灵斗篷和[精灵靴](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%9D%B4 "精灵靴")是游戏中最轻且最常见的两种魔法防具，而且和其他[精灵族防具](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%97%8F%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵族防具 (page does not exist)")一样可以安全地附魔到+7，因此非常适合用于[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")以获取其他魔法防具。

## 历史

精灵斗篷最初出现于[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack for PDP-11，也是[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中最初加入游戏的物品之一。

从[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")到[NetHack 3.3.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.1 "NetHack 3.3.1")，[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")的战士们可能会携带精灵斗篷生成，[3.4.0](/wiki/3.4.0 "3.4.0")版本中加入了[皮斗篷](/wiki/%E7%9A%AE%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "皮斗篷")，并以之取代了士兵起始物品里的精灵斗篷。

在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本中，精灵斗篷能提供[MC3](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")。此外，游戏存在一个漏洞（[C343-401](/wiki/Bugs_in_NetHack_3.4.3 "Bugs in NetHack 3.4.3")）使得玩家无论在何种情况下，都会在穿戴精灵斗篷时自动鉴定之，该漏洞于2010年7月通过[commit 8aecc662](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/8aecc6620416e01f72ec8dc653d4b7ae3a8fc540)修复。

## 消息

- 你移动得非常安静。（You move very quietly.）

  你在没有其他潜行来源时穿上了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。

- 你当然有噪音。（You sure are noisy.）

  你在没有其他潜行来源时脱下了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_cloak/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven cloak.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), elven cloaks provide MC3, and live elven monsters have a 3⁄8 chance of generating with an elven cloak compared to 1⁄4 in *NetHack*.

Upgrading any cloak except for an [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak") has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an elven cloak; upgrading an elven cloak can produce a [cloak of protection](/wiki/Cloak_of_protection "Cloak of protection"), [cloak of invisibility](/wiki/Cloak_of_invisibility "Cloak of invisibility"), [cloak of magic resistance](/wiki/Cloak_of_magic_resistance "Cloak of magic resistance"), or [cloak of displacement](/wiki/Cloak_of_displacement "Cloak of displacement"), with an equal probability of each.

The ability to upgrade high-enchantment elven cloaks is commonly used when replacing equipment or even assembling [ascension kits](/wiki/Ascension_kit "Ascension kit"), and can very easily save a [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") in the process.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an elven cloak grants 1 AC and 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") when worn, along with MC3 and stealth. It is always made of cloth.

Wizard driver [Amm Kamerel](/wiki/Amm_Kamerel "Amm Kamerel") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an elven cloak. The [half-elf ranger](/wiki/Half-elf_ranger "Half-elf ranger") of the rebel leader's party that serves as [quest nemeses](/wiki/Quest_nemeses "Quest nemeses") for the default [Noble quest](/wiki/Noble_quest "Noble quest") will always generate with an elven cloak.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

[hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit_\(starting_race\) "Hobbit (starting race)") Rangers also start the game with a +2 elven cloak in place of the role's standard cloak of displacement.

[Elven wizards](/wiki/Elven_wizard "Elven wizard") have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven cloak, and elven [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") will often generate with an elven cloak. The cloak also appears in the kits of some low-level [player monster](/wiki/Player_monster_\(EvilHack\) "Player monster (EvilHack)") centaurs.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), elven cloaks are somewhat more rare compared to SLASH'EM. In addition to other SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven cloak.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. Details for the elven cloak in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM.

## 百科文本

The Elves next unwrapped and gave to each of the Company the clothes they had brought. For each they had provided a hood and cloak, made according to his size, of the light but warm silken stuff that the Galadrim wove. It was hard to say of what colour they were: grey with the hue of twilight under the trees they seemed to be; and yet if they were moved, or set in another light, they were green as shadowed leaves, or brown as fallow fields by night, dusk-silver as water under the stars.

\[ The Fellowship of the Ring, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 832](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L832)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 200](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L200)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 211](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L211)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 225](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L225)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [dat/tower.des in NetHack 3.6.7, line 142](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/dat/tower.des#L142)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Elven cloak/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Elven cloak
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   精灵斗篷  
外观 褪色的斗篷
装备槽位 斗篷
AC 1
特殊效果
  • MC1
  • 潜行
基础价 60 zm
重量 10
材料 布

精灵斗篷（elven cloak）是NetHack中的一种魔法斗篷。它由布制成，未鉴定时外观为褪色的斗篷（faded pall）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 消息
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 UnNetHack
    • 6.3 dNetHack
    • 6.4 EvilHack
    • 6.5 SlashTHEM
    • 6.6 Hack'EM
  • 7 百科文本
  • 8 引用及注释

生成

精灵族角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵斗篷[1]。

精灵族游侠在游戏开始时会获得一件+2精灵斗篷[2][3]。

非亡灵的精灵怪物生成时有1⁄4的概率获得一件精灵斗篷[4]。

弗拉德之塔的第一层必定有一个小隔间中会生成一件精灵斗篷[5]。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit 20cbadcf，巫师任务的领袖绿衣娜菲利特生成时会携带一件+5精灵斗篷。

描述

精灵斗篷的基础AC加成为1，且能提供MC1和潜行特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵斗篷会产生特殊的消息，并自动鉴定斗篷。

策略

主条目：潜行

精灵斗篷在玩家需要应对有大群怪物聚集的特殊房间（例如仓库番的动物园）时很有用。不过，如果你有其他实用的斗篷了，用潜行戒指等来源提供潜行更好。如果没有其他实用斗篷的话，精灵斗篷可以一直用到游戏中后期。

精灵斗篷和精灵靴是游戏中最轻且最常见的两种魔法防具，而且和其他精灵族防具一样可以安全地附魔到+7，因此非常适合用于批量变形以获取其他魔法防具。

历史

精灵斗篷最初出现于Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack for PDP-11，也是Hack 1.0中最初加入游戏的物品之一。

从NetHack 3.0.0到NetHack 3.3.1，岩德军团的战士们可能会携带精灵斗篷生成，3.4.0版本中加入了皮斗篷，并以之取代了士兵起始物品里的精灵斗篷。

在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本中，精灵斗篷能提供MC3。此外，游戏存在一个漏洞（C343-401）使得玩家无论在何种情况下，都会在穿戴精灵斗篷时自动鉴定之，该漏洞于2010年7月通过commit 8aecc662修复。

消息

你移动得非常安静。（You move very quietly.）
你在没有其他潜行来源时穿上了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。
你当然有噪音。（You sure are noisy.）
你在没有其他潜行来源时脱下了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven cloak.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, elven cloaks provide MC3, and live elven monsters have a 3⁄8 chance of generating with an elven cloak compared to 1⁄4 in NetHack.

Upgrading any cloak except for an oilskin cloak has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an elven cloak; upgrading an elven cloak can produce a cloak of protection, cloak of invisibility, cloak of magic resistance, or cloak of displacement, with an equal probability of each.

The ability to upgrade high-enchantment elven cloaks is commonly used when replacing equipment or even assembling ascension kits, and can very easily save a wish in the process.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, an elven cloak grants 1 AC and 0 DR when worn, along with MC3 and stealth. It is always made of cloth.

Wizard driver Amm Kamerel have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an elven cloak. The half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that serves as quest nemeses for the default Noble quest will always generate with an elven cloak.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

hobbit Rangers also start the game with a +2 elven cloak in place of the role's standard cloak of displacement.

Elven wizards have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with an elven cloak, and elven mercenaries will often generate with an elven cloak. The cloak also appears in the kits of some low-level player monster centaurs.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, elven cloaks are somewhat more rare compared to SLASH'EM. In addition to other SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven cloak.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. Details for the elven cloak in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM.

百科文本

The Elves next unwrapped and gave to each of the Company the clothes they had brought. For each they had provided a hood and cloak, made according to his size, of the light but warm silken stuff that the Galadrim wove. It was hard to say of what colour they were: grey with the hue of twilight under the trees they seemed to be; and yet if they were moved, or set in another light, they were green as shadowed leaves, or brown as fallow fields by night, dusk-silver as water under the stars.

[ The Fellowship of the Ring, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

rawPage:
{{needhelp/zh-CN}} {{languages}} {{armor/zh-CN |color=black |name=精灵斗篷 |appearance=褪色的斗篷 |slot=斗篷 |ac=1 |special=
  • [[销魔|MC1]]
  • [[潜行]]
|cost=60 |weight=10 |material=布 }} '''精灵斗篷'''（elven cloak）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[魔法物品|魔法]][[斗篷]]。它由[[布]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''褪色的斗篷'''（faded pall）。 == 生成 == [[精灵（起始种族）|精灵]]族角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵斗篷{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|832|nethack=3.6.7}}。 精灵族[[游侠]]在游戏开始时会获得一件+2精灵斗篷{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|200|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|211|nethack=3.6.7}}。 非[[亡灵]]的[[精灵（怪物属性）|精灵]]怪物生成时有{{frac|4}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件精灵斗篷{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|225|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[弗拉德之塔]]的第一层必定有一个小隔间中会生成一件精灵斗篷{{refsrc|dat/tower.des|142|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e}}，[[巫师任务]]的领袖[[绿衣娜菲利特]]生成时会携带一件+5精灵斗篷。}} == 描述 == 精灵斗篷的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，且能提供[[销魔|MC]]1和[[潜行]]特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵斗篷会产生特殊的消息，并[[自动鉴定]]斗篷。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|潜行}} 精灵斗篷在玩家需要应对有大群怪物聚集的[[特殊房间]]（例如[[仓库番]]的[[动物园]]）时很有用。不过，如果你有其他实用的斗篷了，用[[潜行戒指]]等来源提供潜行更好。如果没有其他实用斗篷的话，精灵斗篷可以一直用到游戏中后期。 精灵斗篷和[[精灵靴]]是游戏中最轻且最常见的两种魔法防具，而且和其他[[精灵族防具]]一样可以安全地附魔到+7，因此非常适合用于[[批量变形]]以获取其他魔法防具。 == 历史 == 精灵斗篷最初出现于[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生作品Hack for PDP-11，也是[[Hack 1.0]]中最初加入游戏的物品之一。 从[[NetHack 3.0.0]]到[[NetHack 3.3.1]]，[[岩德军团]]的战士们可能会携带精灵斗篷生成，[[3.4.0]]版本中加入了[[皮斗篷]]，并以之取代了士兵起始物品里的精灵斗篷。 在[[NetHack 3.4.3]]及更早版本中，精灵斗篷能提供[[销魔（3.4.3）|MC3]]。此外，游戏存在一个漏洞（[[Bugs in NetHack 3.4.3|C343-401]]）使得玩家无论在何种情况下，都会在穿戴精灵斗篷时自动鉴定之，该漏洞于2010年7月通过{{commit|8aecc6620416e01f72ec8dc653d4b7ae3a8fc540}}修复。 == 消息 == {{message/zh-CN|你移动得非常安静。|你在没有其他潜行来源时穿上了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。|You move very quietly.}} {{message/zh-CN|你当然有噪音。|你在没有其他潜行来源时脱下了精灵斗篷（斗篷会自动鉴定）。|You sure are noisy.}} ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN}} Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven cloak. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], elven cloaks provide MC3, and live elven monsters have a {{frac|3|8}} chance of generating with an elven cloak compared to {{frac|4}} in ''NetHack''. Upgrading any cloak except for an [[oilskin cloak]] has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing an elven cloak; upgrading an elven cloak can produce a [[cloak of protection]], [[cloak of invisibility]], [[cloak of magic resistance]], or [[cloak of displacement]], with an equal probability of each. The ability to upgrade high-enchantment elven cloaks is commonly used when replacing equipment or even assembling [[ascension kit]]s, and can very easily save a [[wish]] in the process. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], an elven cloak grants 1 AC and 0 [[DR]] when worn, along with MC3 and stealth. It is always made of cloth. Wizard driver [[Amm Kamerel]] have a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with an elven cloak. The [[half-elf ranger]] of the rebel leader's party that serves as [[quest nemeses]] for the default [[Noble quest]] will always generate with an elven cloak. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. [[Hobbit (starting race)|hobbit]] Rangers also start the game with a +2 elven cloak in place of the role's standard cloak of displacement. [[Elven wizard]]s have a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with an elven cloak, and elven [[mercenaries]] will often generate with an elven cloak. The cloak also appears in the kits of some low-level [[Player monster (EvilHack)|player monster]] centaurs. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], elven cloaks are somewhat more rare compared to SLASH'EM. In addition to other SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM incorporates the Noble role and its quest, including the half-elf ranger of the rebel leader's party that generates with an elven cloak. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], elven cloaks grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. Details for the elven cloak in EvilHack are applicable to Hack'EM. == 百科文本 == {{encyclopedia| The Elves next unwrapped and gave to each of the Company the clothes they had brought. For each they had provided a hood and cloak, made according to his size, of the light but warm silken stuff that the Galadrim wove. It was hard to say of what colour they were: grey with the hue of twilight under the trees they seemed to be; and yet if they were moved, or set in another light, they were green as shadowed leaves, or brown as fallow fields by night, dusk-silver as water under the stars. |[ The Fellowship of the Ring, by J.R.R. Tolkien ] }} == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Cloaks/zh-CN|JINGLINGDOUPENG]] [[Category:Elven items/zh-CN|DOUPENG]]
